DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate absorption , metabolic pathway excretion JNJ-39823277 healthy male adult administration single oral dose 25 mg ( 0.5 mg/mL solution ) 14C-JNJ-39823277 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion 14C-JNJ-39823277 Healthy Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( people know identity intervention ) single-arm ( group ) study . The study consist 3 phase include , screen phase ( within 3 week prior start study medication ) , treatment phase ( 8 15 day ) , follow-up phase ( 6 day discharge hospital ) . Approximately 6 participant receive 14C-JNJ-39823277 study . Safety evaluate assessment adverse event , vital sign , physical examination , 12-lead electrocardiogram , clinical laboratory test monitor throughout study . The total duration study approximately 6 week .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 20 30 kg/m2 ( BMI calculate weight [ kg ] /square height [ square meter ] ) Had consistent bowel movement habit ( approximately per day ) within 30 day dose No clinically significant laboratory electrocardiogram abnormality Exposure radiation professional medical reason ( exception dental x ray plain chest x ray ) within 1 year study medication administration History current clinically significant medical illness Clinically significant abnormal laboratory value , physical examination Positive test drug abuse , cannabinoids , alcohol , opiates , cocaine , amphetamine , benzodiazepine , barbiturate screen study medication administration
